Title: Requires real estate brokers to institute standardized operating procedures for the prerequisites prospective homebuyers shall meet prior to receiving any services
Summary: Requires real estate brokers to institute standardized operating procedures for the prerequisites prospective homebuyers shall meet prior to receiving any services.
LawCode: Amd ยง442-h, RP L; amd ยง3, Chap of 2021 (as proposed in S.2131-A & A.6186)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to requiring real estate brokers to institute standardized operating procedures for the prerequisites prospective homebuyers shall meet prior to receiving any services; and to amend a chapter of the laws of 2021 amending the real property law relating to requiring the secretary of state to promulgate regulations requiring real estate brokers to institute standardized operating procedures for the prerequisites prospective homebuyers shall meet prior to receiving any services, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S. 2131-A and A. 6186, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
